ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag

Class GameParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.capturetheflag.GameParameters

  • public class GameParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    GameParameters contains all the specifications sent to the system at the start of a round
    Author:
    Michael Vaquier

        public GameParameters(int redTeam,
                      int greenTeam,
                      int redCorner,
                      int greenCorner,
                      int OG,
                      int OR,
                      Coordinate Red_LL,
                      Coordinate Red_UR,

                      Coordinate Green_UR,
                      Coordinate ZC_R,
                      Coordinate ZO_R,
                      Coordinate ZC_G,
                      Coordinate ZO_G,
                      Coordinate SH_LL,
                      Coordinate SH_UR,
                      Coordinate SV_LL,
                      Coordinate SV_UR,
                      Coordinate SR_LL,
                      Coordinate SR_UR,
                      Coordinate SG_LL,
                      Coordinate SG_UR)
        Creates a GameParameters object
        Parameters:
        redTeam - (i=1,20) Team starting out from red zone
        greenTeam - (i=1,20) Team starting out from green zone
        redCorner - (i=1,4) Starting corner for red team
        greenCorner - (i=1,4) Starting corner for green team
        OG - (i=1,5) color of green opponent flag
        OR - (i=1,5) color of red opponent flag
        Red_LL - lower left hand corner of Red Zone
        Red_UR - upper right hand corner of Red Zone
        Green_LL - lower left hand corner of Green Zone
        Green_UR - upper right hand corner of Green Zone
        ZC_R - center coordinate of tower in Red Zone
        ZO_R - grid crossing adjacent to tower in Red Zone
        ZC_G - center coordinate of tower in Green Zone
        ZO_G - grid crossing adjacent to tower in Green Zone
        SH_LL - lower left hand corner of horizontal shallow water zone
        SH_UR - upper right hand corner of horizontal shallow water zone
        SV_LL - lower left hand corner of vertical shallow water zone
        SV_UR - upper right hand corner of vertical shallow water zone
        SR_LL - lower left hand corner of search region in red player zone
        SR_UR - upper right hand corner of search region in red player zone
        SG_LL - lower left hand corner of search region in green player zone
        SG_UR - upper right hand corner of search region in green player zone
